body_html: Is it possible that when you move the distorted_inputs to CPU, the CPU is spending all its time on the inputs and can only process ~7000 examples/sec? Increasing the number of GPUs would not let the CPU process more inputs.
body_text: Is it possible that when you move the distorted_inputs to CPU, the CPU is spending all its time on the inputs and can only process ~7000 examples/sec? Increasing the number of GPUs would not let the CPU process more inputs.
body: Is it possible that when you move the distorted_inputs to CPU, the CPU is spending all its time on the inputs and can only process ~7000 examples/sec? Increasing the number of GPUs would not let the CPU process more inputs.
